KB: kilobytes (in base 10; e.g., 1 kilobyte consists of 1000 bytes)
KiB: kibibytes (in base 2; e.g., 1 kibibyte consists of 1024 bytes)
MB: megabytes (in base 10; e.g., 1 megabyte consists of 1e6 bytes)
MiB: mebibytes (in base 2; e.g., 1 mebibyte consists of 1024^2 bytes)
GB: gigabytes (in base 10; e.g., 1 gigabyte consists of 1e9 bytes)
GiB: gibibytes (in base 2; e.g., 1 gibibyte consists of 1024^3 bytes)
MB/s: megabytes (in base 10; e.g., 1 megabyte consists of 1e6 bytes) per second
hugepages: number of pages in memory that are larger than the default page size
utilization: describes a unitless value indicating the extent to which a device is utilized
